mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_id customerId, d.customer_name customerName, d.customer_email customerEmail, d.customer_birth customerBirth, d.customer_height customerHeight, d.customer_weight customerWeight, d.updatedate customerUpdatedate FROM customer c JOIN customer_detail d ON c.customer_no = d.customer_no WHERE c.customer_no = #{customerNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM customer_attendance WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM review WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM question WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
SELECT payment_date FROM payment WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
SELECT customer_no FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND customer_active = 'Y' AND customer_pw = PASSWORD(#{customerPw})
SELECT customer_img_file_name customerImgFileName FROM customer_img WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_detail SET customer_name = '0', customer_gender = '비활성', customer_height = 0, customer_weight = 0, customer_birth = NOW(), customer_phone = '0', customer_address = '0', customer_email = '0', updatedate = NOW() WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
UPDATE customer_img SET customer_img_origin_name = '0', customer_img_file_name = '0', customer_img_size = 0, customer_img_type = '0' WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
UPDATE customer SET customer_pw = PASSWORD(1234), customer_active = 'N' WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
